scenes.description: Ouro Kronii prepares for her 3D showcase performance, receiving a pineapple from a mascot.
Performance: Fruit Slicing. Kronii uses her twin blades to slice various fruits tossed at her.
Performance: Time Stop Slicing. Kronii stops time to slice multiple fruits simultaneously.
Kronii reflects on the performance and is approached by clock mascots who want to join in.
Kronii slices the clock mascots, then 'repairs' them before finishing her segment.
MC Kronii returns to thank the previous performer and introduce the next contestant.
Cleaneronii enters through a portal and gives her introduction as a contestant.

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: This is gonna be great, it's gonna be a fun time.
subtitles.english: This is gonna be great, it's gonna be a fun time.

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh, thank you, Kronie.
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh, thank you, Kronie.

subtitles.original: What's that? Pineapple?
subtitles.english: What's that? Pineapple?

subtitles.original: That's so cute. Thank you.
subtitles.english: That's so cute. Thank you.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I'm gonna be chopping these up for today, so that's gonna be exciting.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'm gonna be chopping these up for today, so that's gonna be exciting.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for showing it off.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for showing it off.

subtitles.original: And with that, Kronies, stand by!
subtitles.english: And with that, Kronies, stand by!

subtitles.original: All right, good, good, good. Back in position.
subtitles.english: All right, good, good, good. Back in position.

subtitles.original: It's time to show you all what I got. Music, start! Let's go!
subtitles.english: It's time to show you all what I got. Music, start! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Fruits! Come on, let's go!
subtitles.english: Fruits! Come on, let's go!

subtitles.original: Hah!
subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: Sick, sick, sick.
subtitles.english: Sick, sick, sick.

subtitles.original: Hah!
subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: Damn, look at that. I'm doing so good.
subtitles.english: Damn, look at that. I'm doing so good.

subtitles.original: Look at the accuracy. Insane.
subtitles.english: Look at the accuracy. Insane.

subtitles.original: Bam!
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: Whoop, bam!
subtitles.english: Whoop, bam!

subtitles.original: Ugh, look at that.
subtitles.english: Ugh, look at that.

subtitles.original: One shot, one kill.
subtitles.english: One shot, one kill.

subtitles.original: Look at... amazing.
subtitles.english: Look at... amazing.

subtitles.original: Oh, oh! Time stop! Ho! Okay. Phew!
subtitles.english: Oh, oh! Time stop! Ho! Okay. Phew!

subtitles.original: Bam!
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: Um, it's okay. This one's pretty durable.
subtitles.english: Um, it's okay. This one's pretty durable.

subtitles.original: Hah! Look at that. Okay, nice, nice.
subtitles.english: Hah! Look at that. Okay, nice, nice.

subtitles.original: You guys didn't see anything. Perfect.
subtitles.english: You guys didn't see anything. Perfect.

subtitles.original: Just one cut, one clean cut.
subtitles.english: Just one cut, one clean cut.

subtitles.original: Oh, man! That was great and all, but you know...
subtitles.english: Oh, man! That was great and all, but you know...

subtitles.original: ...I'm kind of not feeling it. I wish I could spice things up, but I don't know how.
subtitles.english: ...I'm kind of not feeling it. I wish I could spice things up, but I don't know how.

subtitles.original: Eh... eh...
subtitles.english: Eh... eh...

subtitles.original: What... what can I do? What can I do?
subtitles.english: What... what can I do? What can I do?

subtitles.original: Oh? What? What?
subtitles.english: Oh? What? What?

subtitles.original: Guys! You want to join, too?
subtitles.english: Guys! You want to join, too?

subtitles.original: No, I'm making fruit salad, not clock salad. What the heck?
subtitles.english: No, I'm making fruit salad, not clock salad. What the heck?

subtitles.original: Sigh... okay. Well, you asked for it.
subtitles.english: Sigh... okay. Well, you asked for it.

subtitles.original: The things I do. All right, come on up!
subtitles.english: The things I do. All right, come on up!

subtitles.original: Hah! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Hah! Yeah!

subtitles.original: You guys are so durable, what the heck? You're so thick.
subtitles.english: You guys are so durable, what the heck? You're so thick.

subtitles.original: Lose some weight, bro.
subtitles.english: Lose some weight, bro.

subtitles.original: Phew, man, what a... what a hassle.
subtitles.english: Phew, man, what a... what a hassle.

subtitles.original: I'm, like, surrounded by Kronies with some...
subtitles.english: I'm, like, surrounded by Kronies with some...

subtitles.original: woop, weird, weird things that I can't really say on the show.
subtitles.english: woop, weird, weird things that I can't really say on the show.

subtitles.original: But anyway, I gotta patch you guys up now.
subtitles.english: But anyway, I gotta patch you guys up now.

subtitles.original: Hah! Hah!
subtitles.english: Hah! Hah!

subtitles.original: Okay. See? Good as... good as new. Yay!
subtitles.english: Okay. See? Good as... good as new. Yay!

subtitles.original: You're welcome, guys. Always have to make things weird for me, but you know what?
subtitles.english: You're welcome, guys. Always have to make things weird for me, but you know what?

subtitles.original: I'll live with it.
subtitles.english: I'll live with it.

subtitles.original: Anyway, I got the stage just a little bit dirty with all the fruit juice...
subtitles.english: Anyway, I got the stage just a little bit dirty with all the fruit juice...

subtitles.original: ...oil, maybe? I don't even know. But I hope you all enjoyed it!
subtitles.english: ...oil, maybe? I don't even know. But I hope you all enjoyed it!

subtitles.original: And with that, I'm gonna go. Kronie, out! Woo!
subtitles.english: And with that, I'm gonna go. Kronie, out! Woo!

subtitles.original: Yay! Come on!
subtitles.english: Yay! Come on!

subtitles.original: Thank you for that stunning display, Ms. Kronii.
subtitles.english: Thank you for that stunning display, Ms. Kronii.

subtitles.original: Um, the stage is a bit soiled with all the fruit juice,
subtitles.english: Um, the stage is a bit soiled with all the fruit juice,

subtitles.original: but let's not mind that.
subtitles.english: but let's not mind that.

subtitles.original: Because the next Kronii will help with the mess. Oh, what could that mean?
subtitles.english: Because the next Kronii will help with the mess. Oh, what could that mean?

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness, who could the next Kronii be?
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness, who could the next Kronii be?

subtitles.original: But let's not keep the suspense any longer.
subtitles.english: But let's not keep the suspense any longer.

subtitles.original: Next up, the next Kronii is coming up on stage.
subtitles.english: Next up, the next Kronii is coming up on stage.

subtitles.original: Let's all give her a warm round of applause!
subtitles.english: Let's all give her a warm round of applause!

subtitles.original: Hey-o, what's up? It's me, Cleaneronii.
subtitles.english: Hey-o, what's up? It's me, Cleaneronii.

subtitles.original: Cleaneronii
subtitles.english: Cleaneronii

subtitles.original: You know, it's... good to be here.
subtitles.english: You know, it's... good to be here.

subtitles.original: I think the reason why I should win is because I'm so chill.
subtitles.english: I think the reason why I should win is because I'm so chill.

subtitles.original: Everyone's angry or just so hyper,
subtitles.english: Everyone's angry or just so hyper,

subtitles.original: and I'm just, like, down with the chillness, you know?
subtitles.english: and I'm just, like, down with the chillness, you know?

subtitles.original: And also, I'm here to make this world a cleaner place
subtitles.english: And also, I'm here to make this world a cleaner place

subtitles.original: with my awesome power washer here. So, yeah, let's...
subtitles.english: with my awesome power washer here. So, yeah, let's...
